items.name: a hardback book
items.description: It appears to be a collection of stories by Edgar Allan Poe.

actions.message: You read several spine-chilling tales that send shivers down your spine. The stories seem to come alive in this haunted place.
As you carefully flip through the pages of the book, a leather bookmark falls out and lands on the floor!
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: You have already searched through the book thoroughly. There is nothing else hidden within its pages.

items.name: a lit candle
items.description: It is just your basic magically burning candle.

items.name: some sheet music
items.description: It is sheet music for an eerie piece of piano music.

items.name: a plastic spork
items.description: It is one of those weird eating utensils that is both a spoon and fork.

items.name: several plates
items.description: Three of the plates seem to be arranged in a pattern. There is a larger plate with two smaller ones on top of it on each side.

items.name: a rubber chicken
items.description: It is a novelty rubber chicken that looks as if it were trying to exit the mansion but took a wrong turn.

items.name: a log
items.description: It is a small log, partially burned.

items.name: dead flowers
items.description: This small boquet was probably once very pretty, but today it is dead and wilted.

items.name: secret item
items.description: You have found a secret item which will probably be very useful to solving this game.

items.name: a bullet
items.description: It is a round, lead revolver bullet.

items.name: a small hatbox
items.description: The hatbox is empty but looks like it could have once held a human head.

items.name: a scroll
items.description: The old faded scroll contains a cryptic message. 'When no end is in site, and you walk south with all your might, start over and repeat these simple steps:  South then south again, then go back up north my friend, and see if you find west and east are swapped.'

items.name: a painting
items.description: It is a portrait of a gentleman, shown facing east.  He has a gun raised in his hand as if he is preparing for a duel.

items.name: a painting
items.description: It is a portrait of a gentleman, shown facing west.  He also has a gun raised in his hand as if he is preparing for a duel.

items.name: a window on the west wall
items.description: Looking through the window you see a violent storm brewing outside. Every few moments lightning flashes.

items.name: paintings along the east wall
items.description: There are several paintings here, including one of a lovely young woman named April.  As you gaze upon her beauty she seems to age right before your eyes into an ancient old woman.

actions.message: You carefully slide the painting aside, revealing a hidden safe built into the wall!
actions.newDescription: The painting has been moved aside, exposing the wall behind it.
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: The painting has already been moved. The hidden safe is visible.

actions.message: You push against the painting and it slides to one side, revealing a hidden safe!

items.name: a window on the west wall
items.description: Looking through the window you see a violent storm brewing outside. Every few moments lightning flashes.

items.name: paintings along the east wall
items.description: There are several paintings here, including one of a ship at sea.  As you blink your eyes, you suddenly see the ship has changed into a battered up ghost ship with torn sails.

items.name: a moving coffin
items.description: The coffin has been nailed shut, but something is trying to get out.

items.name: a grandfather clock
items.description: As you gaze at the clock, you see a shodow of a twisted hand pass in front of it. You spin around but there is no one there.  Odd.

items.name: an old trumpet
items.description: The rusted old trumpet looks worthless.

items.name: a slip of paper
items.description: You look at the crumpled slip of paper and notice a faint message.  It says 'Welcome to Allen's Haunted Mansion text adventure. This is just a test and there is little to do here other than walk around and look at things. A few sections of the game have background audio which will load and play while you are there. See how many objects you can find, and you will get a taste of what the real adventure will be like. Pictures will be added soon!

items.name: a raven
items.description: The silent black bird notices you looking at it.  It squawks'Nevermore!' then is silent.

items.name: a glass slipper
items.description: It is a small glass slipper, fit for a princess, yet there is no one around who could wear it.

items.name: a wooden ladder
items.description: A sturdy wooden ladder perfect for reaching high places. You could probably climb it if you were in the right location.

actions.message: You carefully climb the ladder up to the attic ledge. From here you can see the graveyard far below.
You climb the ladder up to get a better view of the grand ballroom from the balcony above.

items.name: a brass key
items.description: An ornate brass key with strange mystical symbols etched into its surface. It looks like it might unlock something important.

items.name: a locked door
items.description: A heavy wooden door with an ornate brass lock. The door is marked 'Servants Quarters'.

actions.message: The brass key turns with a satisfying click in the lock. The door to the Servants Quarters swings open!
actions.newDescription: A heavy wooden door that now stands ajar. The ornate brass lock is no longer securing it, and you can see the Servants Quarters beyond.

actions.message: The brass key turns with a satisfying click in the lock. You close and lock the door to the Servants Quarters.

items.name: a leather bookmark
items.description: An old leather bookmark with strange mystical symbols etched into its surface. It feels warm to the touch.

items.name: a door
items.description: The doors are all identical, lined up in a row. Each one looks like it could lead to a different place.

actions.message: You press your ear against the door and listen closely. You can hear faint whispers coming from the other side. Creepy.

items.name: a door
items.description: The doors are all identical, lined up in a row. Each one looks like it could lead to a different place.

actions.message: You press your ear against the door and listen closely. You hear something scratching on the other side.

items.name: a hidden safe
items.description: The safe is built into the wall and has a combination lock. It looks like it could hold something valuable.

actions.message: You enter the correct combination using the leather bookmark and open the safe. Inside you find a mysterious amulet!

items.name: a mysterious amulet
items.description: The amulet is intricately designed with symbols that seem to shimmer and change when you look at them. It feels warm to the touch.
